caseTitle: Workers Party and others v. Federation of Pakistan and others
tagline: Learned counsel appearing for the Election Commission is directed to bifurcate the details of the measures regarding the conduct of general elections in respect of which the Election Commission has sought amendment firstly showing the portion which is to be implemented in pursuance of the directions of this Court and for which no legislation is called for and secondly with a separate portion in respect of those directions, observations and improvements that the Election Commission on its own intends to achieve the objective under Article 218(3) of the Constitution so that the matter could be resolved.
